channel.title: Need hekp making a Clinet and Server Please
channel.description:
Hello,
I need people who no how to program games, or make servers, etc. I am looking for about 2-5 people on this project please.
I would like the Client to be called PkScape, and i would NOT like it to be like all of the other clients. The way i would like to change it would be buy only making: 1 bank next to a wilderness (1v1 and All vs. All) So it is basically the title ( PkScape). If possable i would still like it to have all of the items that the other clients have. ( Including SKill cape and dark bow etc.)
Regards, Hugo[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 10, 2008, 09:04:18 am[/size][hr]any1?
